Utiles module¶

This module contains other classes

class utiles.CarLicense(license)[source]¶
getValue()[source]¶

Get license value

>>> l = CarLicense("1234 JMR")
>>> l.getValue()
'1234 JMR'
isValid()[source]¶

Return True o False. Check if license have a valid format

>>> l = CarLicense("123456 JMR")
>>> l.isValid()
False
>>> l.getValue()
'invalid'
class utiles.Color(red, green, blue)[source]¶
getValue()[source]¶

Get color value as tuple

>>> c = Color(255, 255, 255)
>>> c.getValue()
(255, 255, 255)
setValue(red, green, blue)[source]¶

Set a new color

Parameters:
  • red (int) – Red color between 0-255
  • green (int) – Green color between 0-255
  • blue (int) – Blue color between 0-255
 
>>> c = Color(255, 255, 255)
>>> c.setValue(255, 0, 255)
>>> c.getValue()
(255, 0, 255)
